title: RADS Error
body: I have been having a RADS Error saying "Could not connect to the HTTP server.  Please check that your Internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access."  I have tried different DNS changes, allowance of League of Legends to Firewall, reinstalling the game, and running League of Legends as an administrator.  I have an internet connection.  Any effort in help would be greatly appreciated, thanks in advanced!

replies.body: Thanks for that!  This usually happens when the patcher tries to open but is being blocked.  Usually an OS or security setting is preventing it from launching.  Go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Unsure of how I use the DirectX Diagnostic, do I send it in a reply to a comment?
The error message is a bit misleading, and it really depends on where it's happening.  Let me know when you see this error message, and I'd be happy to help!
Any time I open League of Legends, the error pops up and I am unable to open it.  This has been happening for a few days now.
